text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I plan to race with Teio soon, and when that time comes…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I would like you to come and see for yourself… Moreover, I would like you to watch over her afterwards.
Just as she had said, a few days later the race between Symboli Rudolf and Tokai Teio began…
The stands were filled to the brim, the entire crowd in an uproar. Both of them are amazing in their own right, so seeing them race against one another…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Woah! There's so many people here. It's almost like the Twinkle Series!! Ahaha, everyone's so excited!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Wait! Hey, so you actually came!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Tsk tsk tsk. You do know that I am the Great Teio, right? So of course I feel great! I'll easily win this and have all the praise to myself!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Wait… Today I'm against Prez… and I'm…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I'm against her…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Huh?! Ah, umm… Nope!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: A-Anyways… I have to get ready! See you later!
And so, as the crowds roars echoed throughout the stadium, the race began.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Alright, I'll overtake you super quick!!
Halfway through the race, Tokai Teio attempted to overtake Symboli Rudolf. However…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I won't let you…!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Huh?! The distance between us is growing!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Nngh! We're already on the final stretch! But… I can still fight!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I said I wouldn't let you, didn't I?!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Uwaah!!
Symboli Rudolf dominated the race from start to finish, beating Tokai Teio with a huge amount of distance to spare.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I lost!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: But as I thought, Prez is amazi—
Whooo!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Eek!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: President Rudolf, you were amazing… Absolutely spectacular!!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: Teio was known as such an amazing racer, yet you beat her in such a clean manner. You really are the strongest ever!!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: President! President! President!!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I appreciate everyone's support.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: They're cheering so hard for her… They're all staring at her…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: They're… only looking at her…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Of course I am! Don't… worry about it…
With the cheers behind her, Tokai Teio ran from the stadium.
I wouldn't see her again until later that night. It was at a park near the academy.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
choice_data_list: What're you doing out so late?
What're you doing out so late?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Oh, it's you… well I don't really feel like talking right now.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Later! Nngh?!
As I rushed over, I noticed that her legs were shaking violently. She's definitely pushing herself too hard.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hmph… It's nothing, okay? I'm going to continue training, so go away!
choice_data_list: I can't allow you to push yourself any further!
I can't allow you to push yourself any further!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Shut up, stop acting like you know it all!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Go away! You're not even my trainer, so don't lecture me!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Nngh… Wh-What's with you?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Sniffle… What's with you… You're scaring me…!
I sat by Tokai Teio's side, trying to soothe her as she cried…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
choice_data_list: Are you feeling a little better?
Are you feeling a little better?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Yeah… But… I still don't get it.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: My chest… It's been hurting ever since I lost the race today.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Seeing Prez have all the limelight and cheers…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I'm strange, aren't I? You know, I've always idolized Prez.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: She's the strongest, the fastest, and the most amazing Uma Musume. And because of that, she's always praised by everyone.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: She's exactly what I want to become.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: She wins every race. She meets the crowd's cheers with a smile. She's just so cool!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: So… why…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I've seen her being cheered on so many times before, so why was today any different…

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Why am I like this… Why do I only feel better if I run like a maniac…?
It seems like Tokai Teio realized something important on that day.
With that in mind, I took her back to her dormitory.
